recipesJson.name: Dragon Fruit with Creamy Rice
recipesJson.author: Untitled
recipesJson.description:
Hi all,
I don't have to say much, feel free to add some sweetener.

reviews.text: I saw 5 percent sweet rice and 5 percent dragonfruit. I bit. This is fucking rad  and so so unique. Its milky, thick, starch laden strawberries and it's so so satisfying and unique. Turns out I'm an untitled fan. Cool work dude!
